DOC.brief_summary: The stage lymphedema size detrimental quality life health woman , increase circumference member weight cause limitation activity . Previous study show patient lymphedema perform high intensity exercise , exercise would cause increase lymphedema . Already , current study show muscle strength exercise properly apply , control intensity time , help reduce lymphedema . Thus , main objective study compare standard treatment lymphedema complex physical therapy versus application strengthen exercise upper limb together complex physical therapy . The study design randomize controlled clinical trial . Participate study 50 patient , allocate two group , group 1 ( n = 25 ) : Complex Physical Therapy ; Group 2 ( n = 25 ) : Complex physical therapy exercise protocol , receive treatment twice week eight week . All patient receive treatment inform free informed consent form begin research . They meet : report card , dynamometer test filling questionnaire begin end study .
DOC.brief_title: Lymphedema Upper Limb Breast Cancer Through Muscle Strengthening Associated With Complex Physical Therapy
DOC.detailed_description: This study conduct Onco Mastology clinic Department Mastology Department Gynecology , Federal University São Paulo ( UNIFESP ) - Paulista School Medicine ( EPM ) , patient recruit , select informed study objective , relevance , activity develop possibility improvement remedy question concern disease.The study design randomize controlled clinical trial . To define treatment , 50 patient allocate two group , group 1 ( n = 25 ) Group 2 ( n = 25 ) receive treatment twice week eight week . Physical examination perform , complete consent form , evaluation form , questionnaire . Group 1 standard treatment : 25 woman lymphedema , perform complex physical therapy manual lymphatic drainage , compression bandaging exercise linfomiocinéticos . Treatment give twice week , 8 consecutive week , 6 sessions.Group 2 standard treatment + muscle strength : 25 woman lymphedema , perform complex physical therapy , manual lymphatic drainage , compression bandage linfomiocinéticos exercise strengthen exercise load.Treatment give twice week , 8 consecutive week , 16 session .
